translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Faculties🔽The Triad-Couplet-Conditioned-Arising Discourse

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽10.17. Sanidassanattika, Piṭṭhiduka🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Piṭṭhidukaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika piṭṭhi duka  na sani dassana sa paṭigham na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa piṭṭhidukam vitthāretabba  na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ🔽nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
analyzed: na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigha 🔽na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe cha

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo
analyzed: na a nidassana sa paṭigham na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ
translated: With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is not a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is not a refuge, arises …🔽With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is not a refuge, arises …

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho🔽nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.🔽Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na a nidassana sa paṭigham na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe cha  na anidassana appaṭigham na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā cha  na sa nidassana sappaṭigham na saraṇam ca na anidassana appaṭigham na saraṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha
translated: With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is not a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is a refuge, arises …🔽With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is not a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is a refuge, arises …🔽With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is a refuge, arises …🔽With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is not a refuge, arises …🔽With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is not a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is a refuge, arises …🔽With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is not a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is not a refuge, arises …🔽With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is a refuge, arises …🔽With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is not a refuge, arises …🔽With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is not a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is a refuge, arises …

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭigham na saraṇam ca na a nidassana sappaṭigham na saraṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha
translated: With an object that is not visible and has impingement, and with an object that is not a refuge, a state that is not visible and has impingement, and that is not a refuge, arises …

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa sabbattha vitthāro  na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
translated: With root cause as condition, thirty … With object as condition, nine … With proximity as condition, twenty-five … With contiguity as condition, twenty-five … With non-disappearance as condition, thirty. (In each case, the method of exposition is the same as in the preceding chapter.)🔽With a visible form object that is destructible and has impingement, and is not subject to cankers, as condition, a visible form object that is destructible and has impingement, and is not subject to cankers, arises.🔽With a visible form object that is destructible and has impingement, and is not subject to cankers, as condition, a visible form object that is not destructible and has no impingement, and is not subject to cankers, arises.

original: naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a visible form object that is destructible and has impingement, and is not subject to cankers, as condition, a visible form object that is destructible and has impingement, and is not subject to cankers, and a visible form object that is not destructible and has no impingement, and is not subject to cankers, arise.

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  na a nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ
translated: With a visible form object that is not destructible and has no impingement, and is not subject to cankers, as condition, a visible form object that is not destructible and has no impingement, and is not subject to cankers, arises.

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na a nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
translated: With a visible form object that is not destructible and has no impingement, and is not subject to cankers, as condition, a visible form object that is destructible and has impingement, and is not subject to cankers, arises.

original: naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigham na araṇam dhammam paṭicca
translated: A non-adherent, non-evident, non-impacting Dhamma arises with a condition of a non-adherent, non-evident, non-impacting Dhamma.🔽With a condition of a non-adherent, non-evident, non-impacting Dhamma, a non-adherent, evident, non-impacting Dhamma arises.

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam ca na a nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a condition of a non-adherent, non-evident, non-impacting Dhamma, a non-adherent, evident, non-impacting Dhamma and a non-adherent, non-evident, non-impacting Dhamma arise.

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ🔽naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho🔽naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ🔽naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  na araṇam ca na a nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na araṇam ca na a nidassana sa paṭigha  na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na araṇaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
translated: With a condition of a non-adherent, non-evident, non-impacting Dhamma, a non-adherent, evident, non-impacting Dhamma arises.🔽With a condition of a non-adherent, non-evident, non-impacting Dhamma, a non-adherent, non-evident, non-impacting Dhamma arises.
With a condition of a non-adherent, non-evident, non-impacting Dhamma, a non-adherent, evident, non-impacting Dhamma and a non-adherent, non-evident, non-impacting Dhamma arise. (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārepi paccayavārepi nissayavārepi saṁsaṭṭhavārepi sampayuttavārepi sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe avigate nava sahajāta vāre pi paccaya vāre pi nissaya vāre pi sa saṭṭha vāre pi sampayutta vāre pi sabbattha nava
translated: Nine by way of condition. … Nine by way of support. … Nine by way of association. … Nine by way of presence. … Nine by way of non-disappearance. …
